ProjectTitle: Cascaded extraction of antibacterial components from brown seaweeds (EXACT)

2. Data description
It might be useful to make the list of datasets more granular. For example you bundle all numerical data into a single entry. It makes more sense to list them separately by experiment or type of data: extraction . data, chemical composition, gene expressions etc. (like you did for documentation). That way the DMP becomes a tool to keep track of the different data files you will create.
7. Data sharing
Do you know which data repository you might use? KU Leuven has RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/rdr
label: good with suggestions
